term.title: arene epoxides

item.text: Epoxides derived from arenes by 1,2-addition of an oxygen atom to a formal double bond, e.g. 5,6-epoxycyclohexa-1,3-diene. [image: Not defined] (Common usage has extended the term to include examples with the epoxy group bridging nonadjacent atoms.)
